item.description: Manage Directories In the previous chapter, while explaining the Effective POM we saw how Maven configures the various directories of a Maven project. In this chapter, we show how to manage Maven directories. Projects gain much by adapting to the Maven default directory layout. However, when migrating an existing project that is generated by an IDE or project that is using other build systems such as Apache Ant, you may wish to retain the existing directory structure and postpone the project restructuring to another day.
